release.action: Changed "svn" to "scm" in order to support git. "scm" starts with "scm:svn" for svn repositories, and with "scm:git" for git repositories.
Changed groupId and package to net.sf.beezle.
Added Sass processing for all css files.
Added "call" comments to replace base LOCALHOST.
Base LOCALHOST is not dumped but issues a deprecated warning.
Pustefix Repository Projects are no longer suppored. Base "PROJECT" and the parameters "project" and "projectDescriptor" have been removed.
Report error for libraries without wsd.properties.
